Will I be charged twice if I delete or lose an issue and want to get it again?

No. Any previous purchases you have made will be recorded in your purchase history. Please see “How do I restore my previous purchases”.

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

  • Call 0800 123 4567
  • Submit a support request

Where have all my purchased issues gone?

Any previous purchases you have made will be tied to your Apple ID. You can restore your previous purchases at any time.

  1. Open the App menu
  2. Tap ‘Manage Account’
  3. Tap ‘Restore Purchases’ and enter your Apple ID password if prompted

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

  • Call 0800 123 4567
  • Submit a support request

My issue isn't downloading or is not responding, what can I do?

To remove an issue from your device follow these steps:

  1. Open the app menu and tap “Downloaded Issues”
  2. In the Downloaded Issues screen, tap “Edit” in the top right corner
  3. Select the issue(s) you want to archive by tapping the small circle to the left of the cover image
  4. Tap Remove” in the bottom right corner

You can always download any issues you already own, they will be available to you forever.

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

  • Call 0800 123 4567
  • Submit a support request

I'm missing some of my purchased issues

  3. Tap ‘Restore Purchases’ and enter your Apple ID password if prompted

I forgot my password

To reset your Apple ID password go to https://iforgot.apple.com/password/verify/appleid

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

I bought a single issue but the app is asking me to pay for it

Any previous purchases you have made will be tied to your Apple ID. You can restore your previous purchases at any time.

What you need to do

1. Open the App menu

2. Tap ‘Manage Account’

3. Tap ‘Restore Purchases’ and enter your Apple ID password if prompted

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

  • Call 0800 123 4567
  • Submit a support request

How do I restore my previous purchases?

Any previous purchases you have made will be tied to your Apple ID. You can restore your previous purchases at any time.

  1. Open the App menu
  2. Tap ‘Manage Account’
  3. Tap ‘Restore Purchases’ and enter your Apple ID password if prompted

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

  • Call 0800 123 4567
  • Submit a support request

How can I download the issue to save in my archive?

You cannot download any charts, patterns or other pages outside of the app. However, we do offer air printing with our craft apps. See “How can I print charts and patterns?”

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

  • Call 0800 123 4567
  • Submit a support request

How can I claim a refund if I'm not happy with something I've purchased?

For transactions made through the App Store (In App Purchases) we are not able to issue refunds. For information on how to claim a refund from Apple please visit https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204088

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

  • Call 0800 123 4567
  • Submit a support request
